title: Chamaeleon - SicK | perVerTed (2013) | mp3@320CBR
description:
Debut album of Greek Aggrotech project CHAMAELEON
Great and powerfull Aggrotech Latin American school

"SicK | perVerTed" the debut album of Greek Aggrotech formation CHAMAELEON.
It consists of 7 fierce own tracks and two remixes, just do not leave any room in any more tracks. Style is quite varies from track to track, thereby making the album more interesting for the listener and does not become bored towards the middle. At the same time, all the songs are similar in that they have catchy melodies that permeate every track entirely, and the sound is quite different from the typical European aggrotech-sound. The sound is directed to the mainstream of Mexican-American dance industrial.
Another distinctive feature of the album, the use of two different vocal styles - clean and distorted vocals are combined into a single track.

Tracklist:

01.Out Of Control
02.The Point Of No Return
03.Sick And Perverted
04.Into The Unknown
05.Beyond Reality
06.Transformation Complete
07.Vengeance
08.Out Of Control (Schizo remix by Headshock)
09.The Point Of No Return (Life After Death remix by Biomechanimal)
